idea-plugin.name: Generate Tests
idea-plugin.description:
Helper plugin for working with generated tests.
Needs a run configuration named "Generate Tests" which updates source files with generated tests. The plugin adds a toolbar button to run this run configuration and when the tests are generated it analyzes changes made to the source files and detects tests that have been added. It shows a popup with suggestion to run them.
Currently only JUnit tests are supported. The project is available on GitHub at https://github.com/valentinkip/GenerateTestsPlugin.
